function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Assumptions made regarding Z ur value for upper-room UVGI analysis based on published mean Z values for aerosolised coronaviruses","Impact":"Incorrect Z ur value could lead to inaccurate assessment of upper-room UVGI installation performance","Mitigation":"Conduct UV irradiation experiments on aerosols containing SARS-CoV-2 virus to determine accurate Z ur value","Technologies":"UV-C field testing with SARS-CoV-2 virus aerosols","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty associated with assumed Z ur value and introduction of worst-case scenario","Impact":"Increased risk of miscalculating required irradiation flux for upper-room UVGI installation","Mitigation":"Use multiple assumed Z ur values to evaluate a range of scenarios and associated irradiation flux requirements","Technologies":"Modeling and simulation tools for scenario analysis","People":"Risk analysts, engineers","Owner":"Engineering firms, risk management departments"},{"Description":"Direct inverse relationship between Z ur, particle residence time, and required irradiation flux","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the required UV irradiation flux based on Z ur value and ventilation rates","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analysis and scenario testing to account for variations in Z ur and ventilation rates","Technologies":"Sensitivity analysis tools, computational modeling","People":"Risk analysts, engineers","Owner":"Engineering firms, risk management departments"}]}
